page.title: 06A Typical Day in the Life of
page.content: On{Saturdays,}after waking at ten, I help dad cook boiled eggs for breakfast before watching T.V..After washing and dressing I tidy my room and make my bed which is quite easy as I have a duvet quilt.Following a sandwich snack lunch in front of the T.V.,mum and I travel by car into town and do the family shopping mainly at Tesco's superstore, stopping for a drink at a coffee bar. Returning home, we put the food away in the freezer, fridge and cupboards. By now it is tea time and I lay the table for our cooked meal.After tea I help mum with the housework.We then change to go to the cricket club where my dad is playing.I have a drink of coca-cola in the clubhouse.We return home at about ten o'clock and by the time we arrive I am ready for my bed.
